description: Allows a user to input a Chip.

isMultiSelect.description: Allow multiple chips to be selected.

value.description: The initial choice (or set of chips) that should be selected. For multi-select, specify a comma-separated string of values.

placeholder.description: Description of the input desired. Only visible when no selection has been made, the `style` is `compact` and `isMultiSelect` is `false`

color.description: Material color palette of chip. Initial is 'primary'.

selectable.description: Whether or not chips are selectable. Default is true.

removable.description: Whether or not chips are removable. Default is true.

addOnBlur.description: Whether or not the chipEnd event will be emitted when the input is blurred. Default is true.

wrap.description: If `true`, allow text to wrap. Otherwise, text is clipped.
